comments.body: this is slightly confusing to me - we deprecated `offset` as a parameter but not the actual `offset` property on the object?

Correct; there is no notation I can find that says the offset property of the pandas Timestamp object is deperated.  However, freq is an alias of offset:

https://github.com/pydata/pandas/blob/master/pandas/tslib.pyx#L258
can you add a test for this (in the appropriate section where the partial string resos are tested)
